title: Quarterly AI tool format review
description:
Review documentation for AI coding tools to check if their context file formats have changed. Update our context system if needed.

Tools to check:
- Claude Code (CLAUDE.md, agents.md) - docs.anthropic.com
- Cursor (.cursorrules) - cursor.com/docs
- GitHub Copilot (.github/copilot-instructions.md) - docs.github.com
- CodeRabbit (reads all above) - docs.coderabbit.ai
- Windsurf (.windsurfrules) - if we start using it

Goal: Ensure our CLAUDE.md format stays compatible and we're not missing new features.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Check Claude Code docs for CLAUDE.md format changes
Check if @context syntax or layering has updates
Check Cursor docs for .cursorrules format changes
Note any new features we might want
Check CR docs for new file patterns they support
Check if path_instructions or code_guidelines changed
Create BUG/US stories if updates needed
Set next review date (3 months out)
